metadata.name: Coming Down ! [Dev]
metadata.description:
Coming Down! adds high-visibility visual tells to all stomp/jump attacks Basically, this mod aims to reduce the frustration against hard to see attacks, coming from the sky and some projectiles like Bumbino rocks. I strongly recommend installing [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487535818]Mod Config Menu - Continued[/url] to be able to choose the mobs impacted and have new options! [img]https://i.imgur.com/UHABsZv.gif[/img]
In addition, this mod is now compatible with several mods: -[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2847697646]Reworked Foes[/url] [img]https://i.imgur.com/J35VnzL.gif[/img] -[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2851063440]Fiend Folio[/url] [img]https://i.imgur.com/lkm5xBz.gif[/img] And others like [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2718219818]Splashy and Roghorn[/url] or [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2700801027]Sigmonstro[/url]
Credit and thanks : -PixelPlz -Querty You can find the reupload version (with delirium) here : [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2880692259]Link[/url] And the original mod here : [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2611178673]Link[/url] Made with the IsaacScript framework
